subject: Cannot access admin dashboard
content:
Hi Support,
Since this morning I can't access the admin dashboard. I keep getting a 403 error.
I need this fixed ASAP as I need to process payroll today.

Thanks,
John Smith
Finance Director

subject: Question about billing cycle
content:
Hello,
Our invoice shows billing from the 15th but we signed up on the 20th.
Can you explain how the pro-rating works?

Best regards,
Sarah Jones

subject: URGENT: System down during demo
content:
System crashed during customer demo!!!
Call me ASAP: +1-555-0123

-Sent from my iPhone

subject: URGENT: Production Database Offline
content:
Critical outage! Production database cluster down since 2:00 AM. Customers can't place orders.
Contact: +44 7890 123456

-Sent from mobile

subject: Login problems
content: Cant login to account. Error keeps saying password wrong but I'm sure it's right.

subject: Billing Dispute
content:
Your system charged us $15,642 instead of $12,000! Need immediate refund and explanation.

-Jane Doe
CFO

subject: Feature Not Working
content: The export to PDF function just spins forever. Tried different browsers.

subject: Security Alert!
content: Unknown IP addresses from China accessing admin accounts. Freeze all logins immediately!

subject: Mobile App Crash
content: App crashes immediately after splash screen on iOS 16.4.1. Urgent fix needed!

subject: Data Missing
content: All customer entries from March 15-20 disappeared overnight. Recovery required ASAP!

subject: API Timeouts
content: GET /v3/users endpoint timing out 75% of requests. Response time increased from 200ms to 12s

subject: Wrong Language Display
content: Dashboard showing Chinese characters instead of English. How to fix?

subject: Password Reset Loop
content: Stuck in endless password reset cycle. Verification emails never arrive.

subject: Payment Failed
content: Critical: Subscription renewal failed 3x. Service will terminate tomorrow!

subject: Slow Performance
content: System became extremely slow after latest update. Almost unusable.

subject: Feature Request: Dark Mode
content: Please add dark theme option. Current bright UI causes eye strain.

subject: Broken Links
content: All documentation links in UI return 404 errors. Need immediate fix.

subject: Duplicate Charges
content: Charged 3 times for same subscription. Transaction IDs: TXN-789, TXN-790, TXN-791
